website_summaries.verdict: Wedding or barbecue, it doesn't matter as the extra length and remote control make this a great set for any outdoor event.
pros: Full remote control over 8 light modes – combination, waves, sequential, slogs, chasing, slow fade, twinkle, and steady
Rated for both indoor and outdoor use
Longer than other strings, giving you the power to cover more distance with one string
cons: There have been a few issues with non-working lights and plug compatibility

customer_reviews.title: Loving the glow
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my room. You can change the brightness and there’s 8 modes to choose from. The only issue was it took a while to untangle the strands before hanging it up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Put this up in my girls' bedroom after a new paint job. These lights really make the room a fantasy environment. I think we're going to buy more for other rooms - we all think the girls are lucky! I also have two 20-ft strings on our deck, combined with overhead string lights with 11 wat bulbs. Between the two the deck is filled with warm, cozy light. Last year the curtain lights stayed on all winter, took a lot of abuse in the weather and mostly survived. This spring I replaced them with new, and plan to take care to keep them from flying around in strong winds overwinter.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Great accent lighting for a backyard party
customer_reviews.text: These string lights are a great addition to any backyard or party room. The only complaint i have with them is sometimes they are difficult to untangle out of the box. I bought three sets, 2 sets i had no problem with unwinding and stringing the base wire, the last set seemed to have been packed by an agitated chimpanzee as they were very tangled. With patience i got them sorted out. Still, 2 out of 3 aint bad as the song goes. Guests love them, love that there are multiple settings for every mood and that they are able to be dimmed. I'll probably buy more to accent the upper deck.
customer_reviews.author: Redjack Ryan

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best things I’ve bought on amazon! I bought soft white curtains to go along with it and they are so beautiful! It has 8 different settings and a timer is you wanna stay on a particular one, and a brightness setting!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I’m actually VERY impressed with these! They’re long with a decent amount of strings. There are different settings for you to chose from on whether you want them to twinkle, fade out, blinking, etc. when they’re lit up they look really beautiful! I decided to go with the warm white because I like the way it looks. It arrive fairly quick, packaged really well, and was fairly easy to install. They’re hanging in my room which creates a nice ambiance. I will absolutely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Elizabeth Comer

customer_reviews.title: Fun addition to any party
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights. I bought these for a work Halloween party and everyone really liked them. I wasn't able to use the remote because I left it in the box but there is a button that you can use on the little white connector on the lights. There is a list of blinking selection on the little white box which is very useful when you don't have the remote close by.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Only half worked
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to decorate a school dance and they only half of them worked!! So disappointed. We didn’t open them until the night of the event so when they didn’t work their was nothing we could do about it. The kids that were decorating were really looking forward to using these lights to make the event look great but instead they looked like they had halfway broken equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Mirabella

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: These are the bomb. The remote control is a game changer. We bought another brand with no remote and it’s a pain. You have to manually put it on the right mode every time it gets turned off. This stays in the mode and with the clicker it’s even easier. I will say that I’m not sure that the length and width are totally correct. I have a small room and they didn’t quite do the whole ceiling. My daughter absolutely loved them and it makes her room very peaceful. Must buy item!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not really outdoor quality
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my house in the Florida keys to leave outside by our veranda, one string lasted 2 days the second string lasted 3 weeks. These are fine for an event or very short term use but, I was looking for something a little nicer, outdoor rated. I will say the vendor was very nice and they sent me a replacement set for the set that failed initially.
customer_reviews.author: Clm75

customer_reviews.title: Memory Function Does Not Work As Stated
customer_reviews.text: I bought this particular set instead of another because it said it had a memory mode, and that it would remember the previous setting after rebooting. However, this isn't the case with this set, at least not the ones I received. I want them to stay on the steady setting, but every night when they come back on, they come back on in an irritating flashing mode and I have to go outside and switch them back to steady mode. Other than that, I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working less than a month after I got it. Also cords came completely unraveled (Disconnected) so its totally down now. Very unhappy with product. Had ordered a replacement but cancelled when it started working again. Now I have nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly

customer_reviews.title: 20 feet of beautiful string lights!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was much much longer than I expected which is a plus! It’s always better to have extra than not enough am I right??? I doubled up the lines to make a brighter 10 feet string light for my windows. I LOVE the handiness of having a remote so I don’t have to plug and unplug all the time or mess with the switch on the string, especially being able to control it right from bed. There are 8 different settings and 4 different levels of brightness for every mood you need.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy. It is 20 ft long as it says and the lights hang down like 7 ft down. The different modes are great too. Used it make a back drop for our daughter's birthday party and it looked so good! Just make sure you don't untie the lights that hang down until you put it up across at the top or else you it will get all tangled up. Also we tied the lights back up the same way before taking down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased to use at my daughter's wedding! They worked perfectly! I'd be sure to read the instructions on how to unpack them before you use them the first time or you'll have a mess. I did lose the remote in the confusion of packing things up after the wedding, but the lights have a button that also allow you to change the settings.
customer_reviews.author: Michele D.

customer_reviews.title: Bright
customer_reviews.text: I will be using these in my wedding reception and they are absolutely gorgeous. I ordered the warm white, some said it gave off a yellowish glow, however, mine did not, they look fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Vanover

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Bright and shiny ! Get a lot compliments during Christmas! Haaaaaaa~~
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for myself. Put them behind my drapes in my room. I had a friend come visit me she loved it so much she order herself one
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy mcdaniel

customer_reviews.title: Twinkle twinkle Little Star
customer_reviews.text: Amazing buy, was super happy with these and they made a great background for pictures at my wedding! Definitely worth it and the remote works well! Would totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JBUG

customer_reviews.title: Lots of uses ♡
customer_reviews.text: They don't come with the sheer curtain which worked for us. We have used ours a few times. Put 2 together and stagger them up on ceiling for icicle look on stage ♡ on the floor with gossamer paper after they got all tangled up for water and a starry night☆ and of course behind a fancy photo backdrop
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: We loved these!! I used them for a wedding and then repurposed them to hang on my classroom ceiling. Everyone loves them and it’s a nice lighting option for my students. There are a lot of different settings to use, which is great n
customer_reviews.author: Shifa Mehar

customer_reviews.title: Very short lifetime
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted a month but were very pretty... Sad that they didn’t work longer...
customer_reviews.author: Natascha Atsatt

customer_reviews.title: It worked great for our party.
customer_reviews.text: Used this at a party. Everyone wanted one. Worked as expected. We brought it home to enjoy. Hope it will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: a mom

customer_reviews.title: some stands didn't work, but still good value
customer_reviews.text: on 2 of the 4 strands that I order half the strand didn't work. We hide it well, so it didn't ruin our reception, but still was unfortunate. They are beautiful, love the remote. For the price and length, still a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Gabbard

customer_reviews.title: 1/3 not working
customer_reviews.text: Just unwrapped this 20' stand as we were setting up for my daughter's wedding reception and 1/3 of them will not turn on. Now it's too late to return them, or order more. :( Super sad.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Olson

customer_reviews.title: Do not take off wire before hanging them.
customer_reviews.text: The lights are just as discrines and fit perfect for what I needed them for our live band backdrop. I really recommend and the price is well worth it. I will definitely order more.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna I. Aispuro

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love it and so does my daughter. I’d hung it around my balcony so I can sit out to relax. It turned out beautifully. I only wish I can find a replacement remote control, since my puppy got a hold of it. Please tell me how to order a replacement remote controller for my lights. Thank you. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Yen N.

customer_reviews.title: Better than photos!
customer_reviews.text: These are stinking amazing! We are using them under the tent of our wedding, I bought one to test....buying 7 more right now! So pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Keskemety

customer_reviews.title: Lighted length is not 20ft
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these lights in December and loved them however when re-ordering for my other daughter instead of having 24 drops, they only had 10. They are no where near 20ft in length either. I have emailed numerous times and gotten no response... very disappointed they do not respond to a repeat customer and make the order right.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Beware of getting it tangled otherwise great lights
customer_reviews.text: I had to spend a couple of hours untangling it otherwise I'm really happy with the result. I have a great feature wall.
customer_reviews.author: acgogo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful backdrop
customer_reviews.text: Love love loved these...the only “but” is how hard it can be to untangle them!!! Save yourself hours and leave them in bound sections until you hang them!!! Then untie. I promise you’ll thank me!
customer_reviews.author: Kasie Altamura

customer_reviews.title: More brilliant and sparkley in real life and nice looking even when off.
customer_reviews.text: This was so perfect for my business windows which are very tall. I am super pleased im going to keep them up all year they added so much sparkle its very sweet.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia smith

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: We used them for a wedding. Everyone loved them. Nice coverage also.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Just WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I used these lights to wrap my canopy bed before installing a canopy curtain. All I can say is WOW. Gorgeous. Amazing. I could keep going.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: They do jottbey do not  have a firm choise of light! ! 8 choises of different spinkle
customer_reviews.text: This lights are AMAIZING!!!!! I bought it for my shop, wich is a restourant and they look beautifull!!!! Super easy to jnstall, very usfull the little remote! Smart!!!! Next year I will buy more for my house!super!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not vacuumable
customer_reviews.text: these are amazing ! Just be careful not to suck Up the ends with the vacuum. :(
customer_reviews.author: Tory S.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Love! Purchased for a photo booth backdrop and ended up deciding to keep them! Love all the settings!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: So cute and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love. I’ve had mine for 2 years now and they still work perfectly. Great customer service also! Sent me a new remote after my dog chewed up the first one!! Super happy with this purchase !
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan D.

customer_reviews.title: Plug them in before you put them up and undo the string
customer_reviews.text: Put these up outside undid all the stings and then plugged them in. They would not work, did everything to try to get them to turn on no luck. Sent them back with full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Esguerra

customer_reviews.title: Will not stay on one setting
customer_reviews.text: It is impossible to get it to stay on one setting. I love the length and color tone but the constant flashing is too much.
customer_reviews.author: Sonyalein

customer_reviews.title: So worth it. Beautiful and Romantic
customer_reviews.text: Love these so worth the money. They make my bedroom so romantic feeling. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy M.

customer_reviews.title: Good but issue
customer_reviews.text: I think it is beautiful, really ties my room together. But, when I turn it off the lights r still subtly on, I fear the lights are draining my power without me even knowing. But the product of overall good, just a bit buggy.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Kim

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I used this behind snowflake design curtains. It was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Strader

customer_reviews.title: cant get it to gently sparkle
customer_reviews.text: trying to get a gentle fading sparkle is impossible. i wish i could find a curtain that the lights are spaced closer together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lights for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These lights worked great for my application. I didn't use them as curtain lights, but. It's not what I had in mind for them anyways. These lights are just bright enough, for a low light evening.
customer_reviews.author: Irving White

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I never bought. First of all, the default setting should be constant on, instead it was a mode with flashing lights, which meant I could not just hook it up to my timer, instead I had to cycle through 8 settings just to have the lights on. Then, after only 1 week, half the strand is no longer working. Cheap and poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best purchase EVER!! So many uses from my curtain rods, to outside on my patio,a wedding backdrop, and even attached to my umbrella over a table outdoors!! In LOOOOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lights are just like it says they are
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful lights. They are small, but mighty! We haven't used them for our event as of yet, but have gotten them out and made sure all of them worked. They did and it is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Coile

customer_reviews.title: Soft lighting for spa treatment room
customer_reviews.text: This product worked very well in our spa treatment room over the massage bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice but too long for my space
customer_reviews.text: They are very nice but i didn't completely read how long they were and i had to return..they are great for the money
customer_reviews.author: R. Green

customer_reviews.title: TANGLED
customer_reviews.text: After about an hour of trying to untangle these I gave up. Looks like it would be really nice if I could get them untangled. Pissed off and waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING IN A WEEK
customer_reviews.text: The light stopped working after 1 week. I was travelling and couldnt return right away. Please dont buy these lights. ABSOLUTELY USELESS.
customer_reviews.author: Ashima G.

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Product is nice but strands where not working. To lazy to return product.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Q

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute!! Paired with a cute little canopy and it’s totally dreamy :) although, there could be more variety with the brightness and I wished it changed colors. Overall though, i love the lights.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Lee Simpson-Long

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: We used these for a big event at our church. We had 4 of them and they worked beautifully! We will most likely order more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and bright!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and bright!! I used it under a curtain for my wedding panel! It was perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: karin

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time purchasing these lights. they stayed out all winter and they still worked in the spring! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Great game. Glad I found it.

customer_reviews.title: worked great.
customer_reviews.text: We used these for my daughter's quincenera. They looked really nice and I loved the different settings you could put them on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect length
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for our wedding. Fit perfectly behind the head table.
customer_reviews.author: colleen cole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting them to be this great since they were so cheap! They are just as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Edith

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Terrible!!! Failed after 5 times of use! Not for outdoor use like description says
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: didnt last not even a month
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lights for christmas and did not last even a month. the lights stoped work . dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lights!
customer_reviews.text: The lights are beautiful but I needed them to be way longer. My fault I didn't realize the measurements.
customer_reviews.author: Aya

customer_reviews.title: Great, not connectable
customer_reviews.text: Lights look really nice and the modes are very versatile. Perfect look we wanted. Only thing is they are NOT connectable. Disappointing but not a big deal
customer_reviews.author: lydia renteria

customer_reviews.title: Lights get tangled easily.
customer_reviews.text: Loved them. They worked great for my sons graduation party setup. Highly recommendable
customer_reviews.author: mgaucin84

customer_reviews.title: Good for one time use only
customer_reviews.text: I used these 1 weekend and now won’t come on anymore. Total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: angie gates

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about these lights. And for the price they are well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Castillo

customer_reviews.title: AMAZINGGG
customer_reviews.text: The customer service is amazing, and the lights just exceeded my expectations. BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.author: Laura Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Completely unusable
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive these lights, and was eager to make sure they worked. I got quite the surprise when I opened the box. It is not ac/dc compatible as the description read. This style plug is completely unusable in the United States. I was going to use these as the background for my husband's 50th birthday. I don't know if this was just a mix up or not. My rating may have been higher if I have even been able to plug them in. Needless to say, they're being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Tella story

product_meta.title: Window Curtain String Lights 20 Ft. 600 LED Fairy Twinkle Lights with Remote, Timer, 8 Modes for Room Wedding Party Backdrop Outdoor Indoor Decoration, Warm White, Unconnectable, Curtain Not Included
feature_bullets: ✭【Designed for Decoration】This is a unique and creative curtain string lights set, which is the perfect decoration for bedrooms, weddings, gardens, indoors and outdoors. The warm white light design does not hurt the eyes, creating a warm atmosphere, which is loved by the majority of users. Not connectable.

✭【8 Flashing Light Modes】The 600 led curtain lights set is available 8 modes: combination, in waves, sequential, slogs, chasing/flash, slow fade, twinkle/flash, and steady on to decorate your room or wedding party, enjoying a warm and romantic time.

✭【Remote Control Design】This curtain lights for bedroom is equipped with timer, which can be designed to be turned on for 6 hours and closed for 18 hours. 8 options lighting modes, 4 levels of brightness can be adjusted to meet your different needs and facilitate the creation of atmosphere.

✭【Easy to Install & Use】The led decorative lights with plug for wedding party are very easy to install and use. American standard socket, voltage 110V. Lighting section size: 20ft.x10ft. A double layer will make the lights look better with a more solid fill for small space use. 14.74 feet long from plug to main line.

✭【Waterproof & Power Saving】The Brightown curtain hanging lights are made of sturdy plastic and LED lamp beads, which saves energy and electricity, and can be touched without getting hot. With IP44 waterproof design, which is perfect for indoor and outdoor decoration. It is great for Christmas, party, Valentine's day, window, bathroom, commercial building, shopping mall, etc. 1 Year Warranty from the date of purchase.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars209 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
